text: Francis Williams Sargent (July 29, 1915 â€“ October 22, 1998) was an American politician. He was the 64th Governor of Massachusetts from 1969 to 1975. He was a member of the Republican Party. Sargent died on October 22, 1998 in Dover, Massachusetts at the age of 83.Funeral to be Nov 4 for Francis Sargent.
